author: BlueGalaxy47
title: Amazing Appearance
review:
This set looks really good as I love the colour scheme and the big tires, making it have an aggressive look. They slanted the truck which was a clever thing to do, and it adds to the aggressive look it has.

The stickers are vital as they have a very good effect on how the set looks.

Also, it has a lot of building involved and is really fun to build.

One thing that could be done to make this set even better is to add a tiny bit of terrain in!
